basics.name: Joshua Chow
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: I am pursing my B.S. in Computer Engineering under the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring 2027. Also, passionate in developing a career in the robotics industry.

work.summary: Provided mentorship to high school students towards application of electronics and aerospace
highlights: Worked closely with high school students on developing electronics for their project for UH Manoa
Research basic rocket trajectory and orbits
Learned the ServiceNow framework to automate/manage businesses
Built networking knowledge base and access point utilization through courses

work.company: Information Technology Services at UH Manoa
highlights: Running fiber optic/ethernet patches through the Information Technologies Data Center
Manage and resolve Cherwell tickets from different departments within the Information Technology Center and on campus

volunteer.summary: Lead developer/manager of the Guidance, Navigation, and Control subsystem within the team
highlights: Working on developing autonomous systems for a Mars Rover
Principle member for leading all subdiscplines within the subsystem. Including Computer Vision, Robotic Arm, Autonomy, Payload, and Ground Station
Transitioned differential drive from ROS to ROS2
